name: John Doe
title: Frontend Developer
bio: I'm a passionate frontend developer with expertise in building modern web applications. With 5+ years of experience, I've worked on a variety of projects from small startups to large enterprise applications. I love creating intuitive and responsive user interfaces that provide an exceptional user experience.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.description: Lead frontend development for the company's main product. Implemented new features and improved performance.
Developed responsive web applications using React and worked closely with the design team.
Assisted in building and maintaining client websites. Gained experience with modern frameworks.
